author: The Hindu
title: Crackdown on vehicles moving freely will continue: Wanaparthy SP
description: Forces in districts bordering Andhra Pradesh and Karnataka in South Telangana seize hundreds of vehicles, including auto-rickshaws
content:
Police cracked the whip on violators of lockdown with an iron hand, particularly in districts where it is more challenging than the capital, in a bid to confine people to their homes in the struggle against the spread of COVID-19. 
The forces in Wanaparthy, … [+1547 chars]
